text:
Ranjan Gogoi (born 18 November 1954) is an Indian judge. He is the 46th Chief Justice of India. He became Chief Justice on 3 October 2018. His term as Chief Justice ends on 17 November 2019. He is the first person from Northeast India to become Chief Justice of India.
On 20 April 2019, Gogoi was accused of sexual harassment by a former assistant.
